title: Microsoft may soon be testing Windows 12 code

title: TECNO’s flagship MEGABOOK S1 2023 checks all the right boxes for everyday use
description: TECNO has unveiled their latest laptop, the impossibly slim MEGABOOK S1 2023, for a global launch at MWC 2023, Barcelona. Boasting a 15.6 inch screen, Intel latest 13th Gen processing, and LDDR5 RAM, the laptop somehow manages to stay just 1.35kg for weight, making it a powerful but portable daily driver device for both professional and personal use.
